_header: The Root is dead the Swan is gone
_description: On the popular discontent at the disasters in France 1449 — nine quatrains

BLCottRollsII23.First Lines: The Rote is ded The Swanne is gooneÞe firy Cressett hath lost his lyght…
BLCottRollsII23.Last Lines: …The ffawken fleyth and hath no restTille he witte where to bigge his nest
